statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); dir_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); printf '%s' "$dir_name"; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf ' (%s)' "$git_branch"; fi; printf ' | %s' "$model_name"; if [ "$output_style" != "null" ] && [ -n "$output_style" ]; then printf ' | %s' "$output_style"; fi
